<!-- Camaron React Native Service Marketplace App -->
<!-- Project: Service marketplace mobile app for connecting users with service providers -->

## Project Overview
- **App Name**: Camaron
- **Type**: Service Marketplace Mobile Application
- **Platform**: React Native with Expo
- **Target**: iOS and Android deployment
- **Language**: TypeScript

## Key Features
- User authentication (sign in/register)
- Service provider discovery and booking
- Dual user types: service seekers and service providers
- Real-time location services
- Payment processing
- Review and rating system
- Calendar scheduling
- User profile management

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: React Native with Expo
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Navigation**: React Navigation 6
- **State Management**: Redux Toolkit
- **UI Library**: React Native Paper / NativeBase
- **Backend**: Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Storage)
- **Maps**: React Native Maps
- **Payments**: Stripe React Native

## Development Guidelines
- Follow React Native best practices
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement proper component composition
- Use hooks and functional components
- Follow Expo development workflow
- Implement proper error handling
- Use environment variables for sensitive data

## Screen Structure
- Authentication flow (SignIn, Register)
- Home/Dashboard with service selection
- Service provider browsing and search
- Booking flow (provider selection, scheduling, confirmation)
- User profile and settings
- Payment and transaction history
- Map integration for location services
